about_the_game:
ToLLA is a fully-illustrated erotic adventure where you play as Captain Hale, a career soldier and infamous ladies' man, as he makes his way through a fantasy world full of horny babes (noblewomen, female soldiers, peasant girls, slutty bandits) and even hornier monsters!

Gather your party and take up the sword against a mysterious Red Queen and her savage hordes, as you struggle to balance your duty against a tide of debauchery consuming the land in the wake of her invasion...​ Will you resist... or give in to your lust? Remain chaste, or drown in crimson tides of promiscuity?

CAPTAIN HALE & MEREDITH


You are Captain Hale, a war hero and frontiersman based in the remote Legion outpost of Fort Ninevus. Always at your side is your trusty sidekick (and ex-girlfriend) Meredith von Mhyr, a well-endowed, sexually voracious half-elven paladin. She's your confidante, best friend, and occasional lover... Together you've defended the frontier from all manner of foes, including a recent greenskin raid that heralded the arrival of a much greater and ancient threat...

SALACIOUS QUESTING & ADVENTURING


Over the course of your adventure you'll befriend allies, fight against enemies, and build yourself a harem of loyal female love interests who'll join you in battle and in bed! All adult content in the game is optional - for those that prefer it, ToLLA can be played as an ordinary (albeit lascivious) RPG. If, however, you want to experience everything the game has to offer, then sit back, relax, and dive into a world full of sensual stories and explicit 2D erotica...

MEET & SEDUCE GORGEOUS WOMEN


The recent crises and invasion have left the womenfolk alone and fearful. Many have lost their husbands, fathers, brothers, and are in desperate need of a strong man! Help them with their troubles or offer them a shoulder to cry on, and you'll soon find them inviting you into their bed! Sleep with them, or refuse their advances while choosing material rewards over sexual gratification. There's many ways to navigate each situation, depending on what you prefer...

PARTAKE IN HOT ENCOUNTERS & LEWD SCENES


The type of adult content you'll encounter depends on the woman, her preferences, location, job, background, personality, and circumstance (ex: lactation from milkmaids and wet nurses, impregnation with cheating wives, magical sex with spellcasters, femdom from domineering bandit queens, breeding and race-play from monster girls, fertility worship with druidesses, corruption from nuns, BDSM with drow priestesses, smothering from muscled she-orcs, etc.).

And for those truly special encounters, there's also a unique tier of sex scene in the form of CYOA books! These lengthy encounters are reserved for plot-critical story characters, and offer branching paths that allow you to pick and choose how you navigate the lewd scene! Whether you're after rough sex or gentle lovemaking, the CYOA scenes have it all!

ENGAGE IN MALEDOM / ROMANCE / FEMDOM


Dominant / Romantic / Submissive paths have also been woven into encounters to further spice them up! Just as you can pick good/neutral/evil options to role-play your Captain solving a problem, you can choose Maledom / Romance / Femdom to resolve some quests via sex! This won't always be the case, but it's present frequently enough to give you a fun sense of progression and freedom in how you handle things... along some extra spicy sex-scenes!

YOUR CHOICES & THEIR CONSEQUENCES


ToLLA isn't just a lewd game, but a true RPG at its core! Every conversation, quest, event, and decision has weight to it. The main story unfolds over the course of a foreign invasion, and there are many ordinary people who'll look to you as a source of inspiration and guidance during these dark times. You can choose to ignore them, but rewards await a shrewd Captain who navigates sociopolitical situations to enrich himself and his followers! How you handle these decisions has a far-ranging impact on your personal reputation, your partymembers' view of you as a leader, and the morale of soldiers who follow you!

INTERACT WITH FANTASY RACES


During your travels through Hortus you'll come across a variety of fantasy races (elves, dwarves, orcs, shifters, goblins, etc.). Befriend or battle them, seduce or ignore them - the choice is yours! Many of these non-humans offer quests or tasks, while others will do their best to get into your pants as soon as possible! From covetous goblins to haughty elves to lust-crazed she-orcs, each one is a unique encounter with something to offer (lore, wargear, treasure, gold, sex, information, etc.). Some will come searching for you, while others are tucked away and hidden in secret locations waiting for you to find them!

ROLE-PLAY AND LEVEL UP YOUR PROTAGONIST ARCHETYPE


Apart from all the lewd content, the game offers robust role-playing opportunities, letting you pick from many available choices that allow you to make your mark on the world! Will you be a courageous crusader? A depraved lecher? A foolhardy drunkard? An oppressive tyrant? Or maybe something in between? The choice is always yours... along with the consequences of your actions! Archetypes let you decide what kind of Captain Hale you want to play as!

ADDITIONAL FEATURES...


  • MEDIATE DISPUTES AS A CAPTAIN

    Make rulings, decide on matters of importance, and pass judgment as others petition you to resolve their problems... You wield authority, and can choose not just who to help (or harm!), but how; follow the letter of the law and deliver just dictates, or twist and bend it in service of your selfish desires! There's no right or wrong way to play, only your way!

  • BUILD UP YOUR ELITE RETINUE

    You have certain duties to fulfill as you bear the burden of leadership - it's up to you to organize, arm, and feed the men and women of the Fort's elite First Company who serve directly under your banner! The Captain's Retinue is your extended entourage - a group comprised of a couple dozen loyal soldiers, alongside all their wargear and supplies. If your core party is like a scalpel, then your Retinue is the sledgehammer you'll send to weaken enemy positions and bludgeon large groups of hostiles into submission!

  • RECRUIT & ROMANCE COMPANIONS

    Recruit a diverse group of companion characters as you meet them in the wider world of Hortus. These trusty sidekicks will travel alongside you on your adventures, offering their blades and spells in combat, and their advice and companionship during downtime... Get to know them, befriend them, and even romance the ones you like the most! Earn their trust on and off the field of battle and they'll gradually open up to you, sharing their personal quest. Opt to help them if you wish to see them grow, or crush their dreams and dash their hopes forever if you desire to enslave them to your will!

  • VANQUISH FOES IN PARTY-BASED COMBAT

    When diplomacy fails, engage your enemies in captivating party-vs.-party battles! Pit your crew of 6 against numerous foes, fighting waves of enemies in exciting turn-based card battles. Equip your party with items and consumables that buff their stats and expand their card hand with new spells and abilities... then crush the opposition through merciless tactics! Almost every piece of gear bestows unique card-based abilities: weapons bring offense, armors defense, and magical paraphernalia spells. Leveling also unlocks unique cards for each hero (partymember). Mix-and-match all this to your heart's content until you've got a mean crew capable of soloing even dragons and demigods!

  • HARVEST RESOURCES & CRAFT ITEMS

    The world is full of resource nodes ripe for the taking! Gather these to turn them into weapons, armors, trinkets, brews, potions, alchemical reagents, and a host of useful enchantments with which to empower your party's wargear! Or simply farm the countryside for materials to later sell at a hefty profit... Crafting stations scattered throughout the world will let you assemble and disassemble items, letting you craft unique gear while breaking down anything you no longer need or want to sell.

  • RESOLVE GLOBAL & LOCAL CRISES

    The troubled times bring with them many crises, some global and others local... Every crisis is unique and specific in its own way, but all of them represent far-reaching calamities or problematic events of one sort or another... These multi-quest endeavors will push your party to its absolute limit, but the rewards are too good to pass them up!

CURRENT LIST OF KINKS & FETISHES


REMINDER: All sex-scenes in ToLLA are completely optional, and can be skipped if desired!
2DCG, PoV, Vaginal Sex, Anal Sex, Oral Sex (Fellatio, Cunnilingus, Analingus), Big Ass, Big Tits, Creampie, Male Domination, Female Domination, Romance, Feet Worship, Footjob, Handjob, MILF, Teasing, Dirty Talk, Titfuck, Urination, Interracial, CYOA

FINAL NOTES & DISCLAIMER


Tales of Legendary Lust: Aphrodisia is a mature role-playing game. It contains explicit art depictions and painted scenes of sexual content which feature only fictional characters, all of whom are consenting adults (18+). There are no sexual or inappropriate representations of children, underaged characters, unwilling participants, animal abuse, or anything else that would be considered illegal in most countries. This project (and everything contained therein) is being developed for an adult audience; Crimson Delight Games is not responsible for any breach of local laws in case of unintentional viewing of this content! Any resemblance to actual persons (living or dead), names, places, dates, or events, is wholly unintended and entirely coincidental.

content_descriptors.notes: Tales of Legendary Lust: Aphrodisia features explicit sexual acts between adult characters of various fantasy races (demi-humans, elves, halflings, dwarves, orcs, goblins, demons, etc.), and passing references to alcohol. The game's content is intended for a mature audience.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo (or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: ToLLA is an adult-fantasy adventure inspired by D&D and Baldur's Gate, with a deep focus on roleplaying and erotic art. Explore the magical world of Hortus, solve quests, loot treasure, sleep with women, build your party, and grow your personal harem by seducing girls from many fantasy races!
